book.synopsis: Anne Frank lived a life filled with the enthusiasms and hopes shared by many young women coming into adulthood. But the times Anne lived in and wrote of in her diary made her simple life extraordinary. In over one hundred photographs, many which have never been published, this poignant memoir brings to life the harrowing story of one young Jewish woman"s struggle to survive during a period of history which must never be forgotten.
book.title_long: Anne Frank: Beyond the Diary - A Photographic Remembrance
